com.att.aro.pcap.packetRebuild

Interface CaptureFileWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PCapFileWriter

    public interface CaptureFileWriter
    Interface for writing capture file.
    There are many formats for capture files which may require different handling, but this difference is not relevant when writing a capture file for analyzing it packets.
    The interface provides the required abstraction.
    Author:
    roni bar yanai

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean addPacket(byte[] thepkt, long time)
      write packet to file.
      void close()
      close the file, make sure data flushed to disk.

    • Method Detail

      • addPacket

        boolean addPacket(byte[] thepkt,
                long time)
                  throws java.io.IOException
        write packet to file.
        Parameters:
        thepkt - - packet as byte array
        time - - time in nano seconds.
        Returns:
        true for success.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • close

        void close()
           throws java.io.IOException
        close the file, make sure data flushed to disk. (will happen automatically eventually, should always be called when we want to use the created file in the code)
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
